QuestData.Title: What's the Matter with the Transmatter?
QuestData.Description: There're spare parts strewn all over to the east in the Scalding Pools, the Geyser Fields... heck, probably even up on the pumping station still, too. Bring back a whole bunch. Maybe then I'll be able to get outgoing teleport on this thing working, not to mention getting the incoming transmatter ports aligned.$B$BI'd hate to see another accident....
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 15 Fizzcrank Spare Parts and deliver them to Mordle Cogspinner at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's going to take a lot of spare parts to keep this thing running.$B$BPlease tell me that you've returned with everything we need.
QuestData.RewardText: That's great, $c! These parts look like they're in serviceable condition.$B$BNow if I could only figure out how to fix this blasted thing....
